name: v0.0.20
body:
## What's Changed
* Remove license / copyright boilerplate from *.h / *.c by @t-sommer in https://github.com/modelica/Reference-FMUs/pull/302
* Use #pragma once consistently as include guard by @t-sommer in https://github.com/modelica/Reference-FMUs/pull/303
* Fix fmusim usage by @t-sommer in https://github.com/modelica/Reference-FMUs/pull/304
* Fix and extend fmusim functions by @t-sommer in https://github.com/modelica/Reference-FMUs/pull/305
* Add Cvode solver by @t-sommer in https://github.com/modelica/Reference-FMUs/pull/306
* Binary start by @t-sommer in https://github.com/modelica/Reference-FMUs/pull/307
* Sample all variable types in result by @t-sommer in https://github.com/modelica/Reference-FMUs/pull/308
* Handle array variables by @t-sommer in https://github.com/modelica/Reference-FMUs/pull/311
* Add LinearTransform.fmu to distribution archive by @t-sommer in https://github.com/modelica/Reference-FMUs/pull/312
* Simplify merging of platform FMUs by @t-sommer in https://github.com/modelica/Reference-FMUs/pull/313
* Add --early-return-allowed and --event-mode-used options by @t-sommer in https://github.com/modelica/Reference-FMUs/pull/314
* Add --output-variable option by @t-sommer in https://github.com/modelica/Reference-FMUs/pull/316
* Add --record-intermediate-values option by @t-sommer in https://github.com/modelica/Reference-FMUs/pull/318


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/modelica/Reference-FMUs/compare/v0.0.19...v0.0.20

name: v0.0.19
body:
## What's Changed
* Be more verbose on building/running/testing FMUs by @beutlich in https://github.com/modelica/Reference-FMUs/pull/272
* Ignore unintended files from win64 binaries by @beutlich in https://github.com/modelica/Reference-FMUs/pull/271
* Consider v_min also as constant for FMI3 by @beutlich in https://github.com/modelica/Reference-FMUs/pull/268
* Do not mention start values for derivatives by @beutlich in https://github.com/modelica/Reference-FMUs/pull/267
* Generate index.html from Jinja template by @t-sommer in https://github.com/modelica/Reference-FMUs/pull/274
* Start FMIVersion enum with FMIVersion1 = 1 by @t-sommer in https://github.com/modelica/Reference-FMUs/pull/280
* Utilize snprintf instead of repeated strncat by @beutlich in https://github.com/modelica/Reference-FMUs/pull/286
* Fix typo by @beutlich in https://github.com/modelica/Reference-FMUs/pull/284
* Utilize unsigned type by @beutlich in https://github.com/modelica/Reference-FMUs/pull/285
* Handle instance == NULL in FMIFreeInstance() by @beutlich in https://github.com/modelica/Reference-FMUs/pull/282
* Utilize 64-bit unsigned type by @beutlich in https://github.com/modelica/Reference-FMUs/pull/290
* Fix memory leaks by @beutlich in https://github.com/modelica/Reference-FMUs/pull/292
* Fix header dependencies for import examples by @beutlich in https://github.com/modelica/Reference-FMUs/pull/291
* Escape underscores in readme by @beutlich in https://github.com/modelica/Reference-FMUs/pull/289
* Prefer GUIDs that differ in more than one character between models by @beutlich in https://github.com/modelica/Reference-FMUs/pull/288
* Bump copyright year by @beutlich in https://github.com/modelica/Reference-FMUs/pull/287
* Define WIN32_LEAN_AND_MEAN by @beutlich in https://github.com/modelica/Reference-FMUs/pull/293
* Fix compiler warning C4090: 'function': different 'const' qualifiers by @beutlich in https://github.com/modelica/Reference-FMUs/pull/294
* Fmusim 2 by @t-sommer in https://github.com/modelica/Reference-FMUs/pull/297
* Bump version to 0.0.19 by @t-sommer in https://github.com/modelica/Reference-FMUs/pull/298


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/modelica/Reference-FMUs/compare/v0.0.18...v0.0.19

name: v0.0.18
body:
## What's Changed
* Remove obsolete example by @t-sommer in https://github.com/modelica/Reference-FMUs/pull/255
* Fix unit by @beutlich in https://github.com/modelica/Reference-FMUs/pull/260
* Fix description by @beutlich in https://github.com/modelica/Reference-FMUs/pull/259
* Need to escape underscore to avoid emphasizing by @beutlich in https://github.com/modelica/Reference-FMUs/pull/258
* Remove filename from DLL path by @t-sommer in https://github.com/modelica/Reference-FMUs/pull/257
* Bump version to 0.0.18 by @t-sommer in https://github.com/modelica/Reference-FMUs/pull/262


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/modelica/Reference-FMUs/compare/v0.0.17...v0.0.18

name: v0.0.17
body:
## What's Changed
* Use CMAKE_MSVC_RUNTIME_LIBRARY to set VC runtime by @t-sommer in https://github.com/modelica/Reference-FMUs/pull/243
* Allow values = NULL when nValueReferences = 0 by @t-sommer in https://github.com/modelica/Reference-FMUs/pull/249
* Add hysteresis for event indicator by @t-sommer in https://github.com/modelica/Reference-FMUs/pull/248
* Set valuesOfContinuousStatesChanged=false in BouncingBall by @t-sommer in https://github.com/modelica/Reference-FMUs/pull/251
* Fix hysteresis in BouncingBall event indicator by @t-sommer in https://github.com/modelica/Reference-FMUs/pull/252
* Allow fmi3GetDirectionalDerivative in Step Mode by @t-sommer in https://github.com/modelica/Reference-FMUs/pull/253


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/modelica/Reference-FMUs/compare/v0.0.16...v0.0.17

name: v0.0.16
body:
## What's Changed
* Update FMI API to v3.0 by @t-sommer in https://github.com/modelica/Reference-FMUs/pull/239
* Update fmiVersion in FMI 3.0 XMLs to "3.0" by @t-sommer in https://github.com/modelica/Reference-FMUs/pull/240
* Bump version to 0.0.16 by @t-sommer in https://github.com/modelica/Reference-FMUs/pull/241


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/modelica/Reference-FMUs/compare/v0.0.15...v0.0.16

name: v0.0.15
body:
## What's Changed
* Link statically for GNU and Intel compilers by @klausschuch in https://github.com/modelica/Reference-FMUs/pull/221
* Add FMI 1.0 import examples by @t-sommer in https://github.com/modelica/Reference-FMUs/pull/222
* Update co_simulation.c by @Maplesoft-fmigroup in https://github.com/modelica/Reference-FMUs/pull/223
* Type casts by @t-sommer in https://github.com/modelica/Reference-FMUs/pull/225
* Fix fmiVersion in buildDescription.xml by @t-sommer in https://github.com/modelica/Reference-FMUs/pull/230
* Remove parameter nValues from FMI3{Get|Set}Clock, by @t-sommer in https://github.com/modelica/Reference-FMUs/pull/231
* Allow early return by @PTaeuberDS in https://github.com/modelica/Reference-FMUs/pull/232
* Fix detection of -\+ zero crossings by @t-sommer in https://github.com/modelica/Reference-FMUs/pull/234
* Fix zero-crossing detection in CS FMUs by @t-sommer in https://github.com/modelica/Reference-FMUs/pull/235
* Update FMI 3.0 headers by @t-sommer in https://github.com/modelica/Reference-FMUs/pull/237
* Bump version to 0.0.15 by @t-sommer in https://github.com/modelica/Reference-FMUs/pull/238

## New Contributors
* @Maplesoft-fmigroup made their first contribution in https://github.com/modelica/Reference-FMUs/pull/223
* @PTaeuberDS made their first contribution in https://github.com/modelica/Reference-FMUs/pull/232

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/modelica/Reference-FMUs/compare/v0.0.14...v0.0.15

name: v0.0.14
body:
## What's Changed
* Align fmi2DoStep() break condition with FMI 3.0 by @t-sommer in https://github.com/modelica/Reference-FMUs/pull/210
* Use x86 prefix for 32 bit platforms by @klausschuch in https://github.com/modelica/Reference-FMUs/pull/214
* Update to FMI 3.0-beta.5 by @t-sommer in https://github.com/modelica/Reference-FMUs/pull/217


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/modelica/Reference-FMUs/compare/v0.0.13...v0.0.14

name: v0.0.13
body:
## What's Changed
* Define strdup only for MSCV by @t-sommer in https://github.com/modelica/Reference-FMUs/pull/209
* Add reset() function to reset state, time, and nSteps by @t-sommer in https://github.com/modelica/Reference-FMUs/pull/211
* Serialize variables in ModelInstance to FMU state by @t-sommer in https://github.com/modelica/Reference-FMUs/pull/212


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/modelica/Reference-FMUs/compare/v0.0.12...v0.0.13

name: v0.0.12
body:
## What's Changed
* Improve C macro style by @beutlich in https://github.com/modelica/Reference-FMUs/pull/190
* Fix warnings by @klausschuch in https://github.com/modelica/Reference-FMUs/pull/194
* Fix for #195 by @klausschuch in https://github.com/modelica/Reference-FMUs/pull/198
* Add .gitattributes and normalize line endings by @t-sommer in https://github.com/modelica/Reference-FMUs/pull/192
* Convert Python Unit tests to pytest by @t-sommer in https://github.com/modelica/Reference-FMUs/pull/201
* Update FMI headers to v3.0-beta.4 by @t-sommer in https://github.com/modelica/Reference-FMUs/pull/206
* Bump version to 0.0.12 by @t-sommer in https://github.com/modelica/Reference-FMUs/pull/207


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/modelica/Reference-FMUs/compare/v0.0.11...v0.0.12

name: v0.0.11
body:
## What's Changed
* Handle fmi2Discard by @t-sommer in https://github.com/modelica/Reference-FMUs/pull/187
* Add cmake install for FMUs by @klausschuch in https://github.com/modelica/Reference-FMUs/pull/184
* FMI 3.0 Beta.3 by @t-sommer in https://github.com/modelica/Reference-FMUs/pull/189
* Allow intermediate access of BouncingBall outputs by @klausschuch in https://github.com/modelica/Reference-FMUs/pull/183
* Bump version to 0.0.11 by @t-sommer in https://github.com/modelica/Reference-FMUs/pull/191


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/modelica/Reference-FMUs/compare/v0.0.10...v0.0.11

## What's Changed

* Fix value references and variable types in LinearTransform by @t-sommer in https://github.com/modelica/Reference-FMUs/pull/119
* Implement {get|set}UInt64() by @t-sommer in https://github.com/modelica/Reference-FMUs/pull/126
* Add import framework by @t-sommer in https://github.com/modelica/Reference-FMUs/pull/122
* Allow logMessage == NULL in FMI 3.0 by @t-sommer in https://github.com/modelica/Reference-FMUs/pull/127
* Clean up by @t-sommer in https://github.com/modelica/Reference-FMUs/pull/129
* Add extern "C" { ... } to import framework headers by @t-sommer in https://github.com/modelica/Reference-FMUs/pull/131
* Separate FMI version in import framework by @t-sommer in https://github.com/modelica/Reference-FMUs/pull/133
* 115 result files by @t-sommer in https://github.com/modelica/Reference-FMUs/pull/134
* Add eventEncountered and terminateSimulation to doStep() by @t-sommer in https://github.com/modelica/Reference-FMUs/pull/135
* Clean up by @t-sommer in https://github.com/modelica/Reference-FMUs/pull/136
* Add FMIURIToPath() to import framework by @t-sommer in https://github.com/modelica/Reference-FMUs/pull/137
* Add examples by @t-sommer in https://github.com/modelica/Reference-FMUs/pull/138
* Log error if LOAD_SYMBOL() fails by @t-sommer in https://github.com/modelica/Reference-FMUs/pull/139
* Fix vr in dim of y of LinearTransform FMU by @klausschuch in https://github.com/modelica/Reference-FMUs/pull/143
* Update short variable access by @beutlich in https://github.com/modelica/Reference-FMUs/pull/151
* Add reference CSV to FMU documentation by @beutlich in https://github.com/modelica/Reference-FMUs/pull/149
* Detect unsupported VS at configure time (and not at compile time) by @beutlich in https://github.com/modelica/Reference-FMUs/pull/146
* Add FMIPlatformBinaryPath() and FMIPlatformBinaryPath() by @t-sommer in https://github.com/modelica/Reference-FMUs/pull/145
* Mention minimum required VS version by @beutlich in https://github.com/modelica/Reference-FMUs/pull/148
* Force ANSI version by @beutlich in https://github.com/modelica/Reference-FMUs/pull/147
* Handle null pointers in logger callbacks by @t-sommer in https://github.com/modelica/Reference-FMUs/pull/153
* Add attribute generationTool to modelDescription.xml by @t-sommer in https://github.com/modelica/Reference-FMUs/pull/156
* Do not check for untracked files by @beutlich in https://github.com/modelica/Reference-FMUs/pull/158
* Fix build workflow for set_tool_version by @beutlich in https://github.com/modelica/Reference-FMUs/pull/157
* Add FMI 2.0 examples by @t-sommer in https://github.com/modelica/Reference-FMUs/pull/161
* Handle missing functions by @t-sommer in https://github.com/modelica/Reference-FMUs/pull/168
* Implement early return and update example by @t-sommer in https://github.com/modelica/Reference-FMUs/pull/170
* Implement Event Mode and Intermediate Update in CS by @t-sommer in https://github.com/modelica/Reference-FMUs/pull/172
* Enable compiler warnings by @t-sommer in https://github.com/modelica/Reference-FMUs/pull/173
* Enter Event Mode after Initialization Mode if useEventMode = true by @t-sommer in https://github.com/modelica/Reference-FMUs/pull/175
* Fix examples by @t-sommer in https://github.com/modelica/Reference-FMUs/pull/177
* Add hasEventMode attribute and remove isNewEventIteration by @t-sommer in https://github.com/modelica/Reference-FMUs/pull/178
* Change FIXED_SOLVER_STEP to 1e-3 for BouncingBall by @t-sommer in https://github.com/modelica/Reference-FMUs/pull/179
* Reset event indicators by @t-sommer in https://github.com/modelica/Reference-FMUs/pull/180
* Fix fmiVersion in buildDescription.xml by @t-sommer in https://github.com/modelica/Reference-FMUs/pull/181
* Implement fmi3GetOutputDerivatives() by @t-sommer in https://github.com/modelica/Reference-FMUs/pull/182

## New Contributors
* @klausschuch made their first contribution in https://github.com/modelica/Reference-FMUs/pull/143

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/modelica/Reference-FMUs/compare/v0.0.9...v0.0.10

## Enhancements

- Update FMI 3.0 API to FMI 3.0-beta.2

## Bug Fixes

- Add independent variable "time" (#107)
- Fix Model Structure of Feedthrough model (#100)
- Use platform binaries and update examples (#52)
- Handle time events in model exchange example (#72)

## Bug Fixes

- Fix Clocks/FMI3.xml and validate in CI (#93)

## Bug Fixes

- Fix model structure in Feedthrough/FMI3.xml

## Enhancements

- Update API to FMI 3.0-beta.1 (#92)
- Update Clocks model and SE examples (#88)

## Bug Fixes

- Add allowed states for fmi3SetFloat()
- Handle spaces (%20) in fmuResourceLocation URI  (#74)
- Set terminate return value in fmi3DoStep()

## Enhancements

- Update FMI 3.0 headers and schema to FMI 3.0-alpha.6 (#83)
- Remove obsolete Resource/FMI1ME.xml (#73)

### Bug fixes

- Add Clocks.fmu to distribution (#68)
- Update capability attributes (#66)
- Set state in fmi3ExitInitializationMode()
- Set state in fmi3EnterStepMode()
- Handle NULL pointers in fmi3NewDiscreteStates()
- Return lastSuccessfulTime in fmi3DoStep()
- Fix fmiVersion in FMI 3 XMLs (#55)

### Enhancements

- Implement set/get FMU state
- Change master/slave terminology to importer/FMU (#60)

This release fixes and improves the model description, implementation, and documentation of the FMUs.
The FMI 3.0 API has been updated to v3.0-alpha.5.
